Articles.Content:
Since I have played Kerbal Space Program (started with 0.13.2) 2 years ago now, I will do a short livestream of a mission based on my first attempts at rocket flight ever in KSP. No orbital maneuvers will be performed per se, but rather a basic liftoff to see how high I can go.

Link: http://www.twitch.tv/bandock666

Streaming should start between 7:00 PM-7:10 PM CST.
It just started, if anybody wanted to know.
Stream has now ended. For those who missed, it should be archived.
